semantic: An input which allows users to upload a file from their device

error-state.semantic: When a file upload validation rejects a file or there is some other error, styling changes to reflect this system feedback.

uploaded-state.semantic: The uploaded state is the state of the file input component after the User has added some files to it for uploading. It gives a summary of what files have been uploaded and gives the user the option of changing those files

top.semantic: Top section of the upload state component.

heading.semantic: The heading lists how many files have been set to upload via the file input component.

change-files-button.semantic: A link-styled button used to restart the file upload process.

file-upload-item.semantic: The individual files that have been set to upload by the User.

file-extension-icon.semantic: Icon visually identifying what file extension the file being uploaded is.
